致 香港九大藝團及各中小藝團董事局及管理層之公開呼籲

我們是一群表演藝術工作者，將會響應香港市民發起的2019年8月5日全港大罷工。
我們促請直接和間接接受香港政府資助的各個演藝團體，加入我們的罷工行列，團結行業，上下一心，以行動譴責漠視市民的香港政府和草菅人命的香港警察。
九大藝團及各大小藝團在香港藝術界具有舉足輕重的地位，同時面向龐大觀眾群，接觸社會各階層。我們懇請各藝團運用你們的影響力，向社會各界傳遞訊息，守護公義，捍衛自由民主和人權的普世價值，並向你們直接的資助者 —香港政府—表明立場。

我們呼籲各大藝團以良心行事：
1）支持8月5日全行罷工
2）支持藝團員工參與罷工，並承諾不追究罷工員工
3）要求政府成立獨立調查委員會，調查修訂逃犯條例爭議，及其後政府和警方對市民之連串維護社會秩序的行動，以証明是否行動失當。
4）履行受政府資助者的社會責任，敦促政府正面回應香港市民五大訴求

我們呼籲各大小藝團在8月2日18:00 前就以上公開作出回應，以示我們個人對香港的真實關懷。
表演藝術工作者一直與藝團在創作與製作上同行，在現今的危急關頭，沒有人可以獨善其身，懇請各藝團與我們携手一起！作為香港藝術界別的各團體，在大是大非的方向面前，有屬於你們的位置！

一群本地表演藝術工作者 上
2019年8月1日

受文人：中英劇團、城市當代舞蹈團、香港小交響樂團、香港中樂團、香港芭蕾舞團、香港話劇團、香港管弦樂團、香港舞蹈團、進念二十面體、香港各大小藝團
副本送：傳媒

A public appeal to the boards of directors and management of the nine major arts groups and all other arts groups in Hong Kong

We are a group of performing arts workers who will respond to the Hong Kong people's strike on August 5, 2019. We urge the nine major performing arts groups and all the other arts groups directly funded by the Hong Kong SAR Government to join our strikes, unite the industry, and work together to pressure the Hong Kong Government to face the citizens and condemn the ignorance and violence of the Hong Kong Police Force.

The nine major arts groups and numerous arts groups of various sizes have a leading role and a large audience in the Hong Kong arts scene, reaching across all sectors of society. We urge the nine major performing arts group to exercise your influence to convey messages from the community, to protect justice, to defend the universal values of freedom, democracy and human rights, and to exert pressure on your direct funder, the Hong Kong SAR Government, to solemnly stand your ground.

We hereby call upon the nine major performing arts groups and all other arts groups take conscientious actions:
1. Support the strike on August 5
2. Support your employees to join the strike and promise not to pursue strike employees.
3. Release official statement in response to the dispute about the extradition bill and all the violent repression from the government and the police force
4. Urge the government to respond to the Five Demands from the Hong Kong citizens, so as to fulfill the social responsibility of the government-funded organizations.

In order to show your humanistic care to the Hong Kong people, we urge the nine major performing arts groups and all other arts groups to respond to the four points above on or before 1800 on August 2.

Performing arts workers have always been with the arts groups in their creation and productions. At today's critical juncture, we cannot remain silent at the crossroads of right and wrong. As the flagship groups of the Hong Kong arts industry, there is a place for you on the front line.

致 香港九大藝團及各中小藝團董事局及管理層之公開呼籲

我們是一群表演藝術工作者，將會響應香港市民發起的2019年8月5日全港大罷工。
我們促請直接和間接接受香港政府資助的各個演藝團體，加入我們的罷工行列，團結行業，上下一心，以行動譴責漠視市民的香港政府和草菅人命的香港警察。
九大藝團及各大小藝團在香港藝術界具有舉足輕重的地位，同時面向龐大觀眾群，接觸社會各階層。我們懇請各藝團運用你們的影響力，向社會各界傳遞訊息，守護公義，捍衛自由民主和人權的普世價值，並向你們直接的資助者 —香港政府—表明立場。

我們呼籲各大藝團以良心行事：
1）支持8月5日全行罷工
2）支持藝團員工參與罷工，並承諾不追究罷工員工
3）要求政府成立獨立調查委員會，調查修訂逃犯條例爭議，及其後政府和警方對市民之連串維護社會秩序的行動，以証明是否行動失當。
4）履行受政府資助者的社會責任，敦促政府正面回應香港市民五大訴求

我們呼籲各大小藝團在8月2日18:00 前就以上公開作出回應，以示我們個人對香港的真實關懷。
表演藝術工作者一直與藝團在創作與製作上同行，在現今的危急關頭，沒有人可以獨善其身，懇請各藝團與我們携手一起！作為香港藝術界別的各團體，在大是大非的方向面前，有屬於你們的位置！

A public appeal to the boards of directors and management of the nine major arts groups and all other arts groups in Hong Kong

We are a group of performing arts workers who will respond to the Hong Kong people's strike on August 5, 2019. We urge the nine major performing arts groups and all the other arts groups directly funded by the Hong Kong SAR Government to join our strikes, unite the industry, and work together to pressure the Hong Kong Government to face the citizens and condemn the ignorance and violence of the Hong Kong Police Force.

The nine major arts groups and numerous arts groups of various sizes have a leading role and a large audience in the Hong Kong arts scene, reaching across all sectors of society. We urge the nine major performing arts group to exercise your influence to convey messages from the community, to protect justice, to defend the universal values of freedom, democracy and human rights, and to exert pressure on your direct funder, the Hong Kong SAR Government, to solemnly stand your ground.

We hereby call upon the nine major performing arts groups and all other arts groups take conscientious actions:
1. Support the strike on August 5
2. Support your employees to join the strike and promise not to pursue strike employees.
3. Release official statement in response to the dispute about the extradition bill and all the violent repression from the government and the police force
4. Urge the government to respond to the Five Demands from the Hong Kong citizens, so as to fulfill the social responsibility of the government-funded organizations.

In order to show your humanistic care to the Hong Kong people, we urge the nine major performing arts groups and all other arts groups to respond to the four points above on or before 1800 on August 2.

Performing arts workers have always been with the arts groups in their creation and productions. At today's critical juncture, we cannot remain silent at the crossroads of right and wrong. As the flagship groups of the Hong Kong arts industry, there is a place for you on the front line.
